questions: Thousands of tourists visit Edinburgh every year. The capital of Scotland is 29______ (FAME) for its history and architecture.
There are pills for everything. If you can't sleep you take a pill. If you're depressed or just 29_____ (HAPPY), you can also take a pill.
People spend hours talking on their mobile phones. There is an opinion that it may be 29_______ (HARM) to their health.
Learning languages is becoming a popular hobby with children and adults. It's not only interesting but very 29________ (USE), too.
British cuisine is simple. Puddings, stews, pies and breads are 29______ (TRADITION) British dishes.
How do people learn the news? About a century ago people got 29________ (INFORM) from newspapers.
Ratatouille is an American cartoon. The name of the cartoon comes from a 29___________ (TRADITION) French dish made of vegetables.
Dublin is the capital city of the Republic of Ireland. It has an 29.__________________ (NATIONAL) airport with flights from London.
What do you think is the most stressful and 29. __________________ (DANGER) job in Britain?
My first job was working at a bakery. When I walked from my house to the bakery I could smell the 29. __________________ (WONDER) aroma of the fresh bread.
In Andorra people live longer than in any other European country. It seems they have discovered the secret of a long and 29. __________________ (HEALTH) life.
Ballroom dancing in the UK is making a comeback. For the past five years its popularity has grown thanks to the TV show 'Strictly Come Dancing'.
The best thing about shopping in London is that there really are hundreds of cool shops selling 29. ________________ (FASHION) clothes.
London is famous for its history and its sights. It is also a wonderful place for shopaholics.
Every year the world goes dark for one hour, the Earth Hour. The event is organised by the 29. ____________ (NATION) World Wildlife Fund.
The Turners were not used to snow. The most they ever got in Birmingham was an inch or so each winter.
Dr Michael Werner says that he has eaten nothing for four years. The German 29. ___________ (SCIENCE) explains that he gets all his energy from sunlight.
Many tourists don't like staying in city hotels. They prefer to avoid 29. _____________ (NOISE) cities completely.
Piranhas are South American fish. There are lots of scary stories about them. Most people think that piranhas are very 29. __________________ (DANGER) creatures.
Have you heard of a Tadeus Bodnar? He is a 29. ______________ (FAME) Hungarian hairdresser.
The internet has changed the way we communicate. It has made it much more 29__________ (EASY) to stay in touch.
Many people believe that social media can be quite 29__________ (ADDICT) if not used wisely.
The Amazon rainforest is home to many 29__________ (DANGER) species.
Conservation efforts are crucial for protecting 29__________ (ENDANGER) animals.
The new smartphone model is very 29__________ (INNOVATE) and has many advanced features.
Technology is becoming increasingly 29__________ (IMPORT) in our daily lives.
The documentary provided a lot of 29__________ (VALUE) information about climate change.
It's important to have a 29__________ (BALANCE) diet for good health.
The teacher gave us a very 29__________ (CHALLENGE) assignment that required a lot of research.
Studying abroad can be a very 29__________ (ENRICH) experience.
The festival was a 29__________ (SPECTACLE) event with colorful parades and performances.
The view from the top of the mountain was absolutely 29__________ (BREATHE)!
The new policy aims to create a more 29__________ (EQUAL) society.
It's essential to promote 29__________ (DIVERSITY) in the workplace.
The artist's work is known for its 29__________ (UNIQUE) style.
Many people find art to be a very 29__________ (INSPIRATION) form of expression.
The scientist made a 29__________ (SIGNIFICANT) discovery that could change medicine.
It's important to have a 29__________ (CLEAR) understanding of the topic before discussing it.

The book was so 29__________ (CAPTIVATE) that I couldn't put it down.
The athlete's performance was truly 29__________ (IMPRESS).
The movie received 29__________ (POSITIVE) reviews from critics.
The lecture was very 29__________ (EDUCATE) and provided new insights.
It's important to have 29__________ (ACCURATE) information when making decisions.
The new law aims to protect the 29__________ (VULNERABLE) members of society.
It's essential to have a 29__________ (SUSTAIN) approach to development.
The team worked very 29__________ (HARD) to meet the deadline.
The results of the experiment were 29__________ (SURPRISE).
The new software is very 29__________ (USER) friendly.
The conference was a great opportunity for 29__________ (NETWORK).
The landscape was 29__________ (STUNNING) and took my breath away.
The project was completed ahead of 29__________ (SCHEDULE).
The charity event raised a 29__________ (SIGNIFICANT) amount of money.
It's important to have a 29__________ (POSITIVE) attitude in life.
The new policy is designed to be more 29__________ (EFFECTIVE).
The team showed great 29__________ (DETERMINATION) in achieving their goals.
The presentation was very 29__________ (INFORMATIVE) and engaging.
The community is working towards a more 29__________ (SUSTAIN) future.
The new product is designed to be more 29__________ (EFFICIENT).
The festival was a 29__________ (CELEBRATE) of culture and art.
The documentary highlighted the 29__________ (IMPORT) of wildlife conservation.
